name: Meeting self in reflection
description: This work is an acrylics and ink experiment in a project called Temporal Densities/Temporal Velocities. I played with acrylic paint and ink and kept teasing out the motif throughout the drying time until I no longer could affect it. This time (hours of night) was also a meditative time for reflection and silent immersion -getting lost in the abstract shapes and somehow primordially intuitive markmaking. In the digital version the image is also reflected onto itself, opening another way of seeing
